an5.149:4.1: “Mendicants, these five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.149:4.3: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.149:4.4: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.149:5.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.
an5.149:5.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.149:5.4: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant who is temporarily free.”
